name: Icy Cave
description:
ICY CAVE
A very simple puzzle game where you must step on the ice to crack it and try to reach the finish by cracking each block of ice. But be careful, stepping on an already cracked block of ice will cause for it to break and you'll fall through!

CONTROLS
WASD to move

DEV NOTES
This is the first game I've tried to publish to this site, so please let me know if there are any errors I've made or bugs with the game itself :)
